and <S%G71>brought<s%> the <S%G3688>donkey<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4454>colt,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> laid <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>clothes<s%> <S%G1883>on<s%> <S%G846>them;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G1940>sat<s%> on <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> in the <S%G4405>morning,<s%> as he <S%G1877>returned<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> he was <S%G3983>hungry.<s%>

<S%G2532>All<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> <S%G302>you<s%> <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> <S%G4100>believing,<s%> you will <S%G2983>receive.<s%>"

<S%G191>"Hear<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G444>parable.<s%> There <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> who was a master of a <S%G3617>household,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G5452>planted<s%> a <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> <S%G2532>set<s%> a <S%G5418>hedge<s%> <S%G4060>about<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G3736>dug<s%> a <S%G3025>winepress<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G3618>built<s%> a <S%G4444>tower,<s%> <S%G1554>leased<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G1554>out<s%> to <S%G1092>farmers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> went into another <S%G589>country.<s%>

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> than the <S%G4413>first:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4160>treated<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> the same <S%G5615>way.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> afterward he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>son,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1788><s%> 'They will respect <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>son.<s%>'
